name: UNITED FRIENDS
briefDescription: General Body:The initial General Body was consists of 14(Eleven) but presently the General Body of United Friends is consists of 17 (Seventeen) membership.Executive Committee:The Executive Committee is total responsible for its management, operations and also to confirm successful implementation of all the development programmes of the Organisation. The Executive Committee also delegating itâ€™s powers to the programme Implementation Committees helping for successful implementation of its programmes.The Executive Committee of United Friends is comprises of 9(Nine) members nominated and/or elected by the General Body.OPERATIONS:Health & Legal Aid Awareness Programmes.District Disaster ManagementEntrepreneurship Development ConsultancyDetail Project Report writing on PMEGP, Swavalamban and MUDRA loan scheme up to 25 lacs.Skill Development Training - PMKVY, NDLM, ESDM, SUTPCarrier Consultancy- CV/Resume/Bio DataE-Governance- PAN/TAN/PASSPORT/Adhaar,Sports and Culture
